page.title: 04THE COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: In Misson we have a community centre which you can hire for anything you want.It is the old school and a variety of groups meet there.For example the youth club,sunday school,womens institute,play group,mother and toddler and ladies keep fit.It can also be hired for birthdays,anniversaries,weddings etc.At the youth club,which is held on Tuesdays and Fridays from 7.30 PM to 10.00 PM,we have pop and crisps,we listen to pop music,sometimes a video. We play Yatzee,Chess,Draughts,Cards,Connect 4,Snooker,Pool and darts.Sometimes we go outside. On Mondays mums meet there with their young children who are not yet at school,so the children can play and mums chat.In the winter there is a keep fit class from 8-9 o'clock.
